timeline.bodyText: This should be a POST. PUT is used to set the state on the server, whereas this API requests a server action (sending an email).
timeline.author: nikklassen

timeline.bodyText: If userResponse has a status code you should always be using that instead of setting the OK case yourself.
timeline.author: nikklassen

replies.bodyText: Refactored the code to fix the review comment. Added MessageCode enum for success messages. Please share your thoughts so that I can request the team to use the MessageCode enum for success messages.
